briefTitle: Discerning the Impact of ctDNA Detection on Patient Decision Making in Early Stage Breast Cancer: a Conjoint Analysis
officialTitle: Discerning the Impact of ctDNA Detection on Patient Decision Making in Early Stage Breast Cancer: a Conjoint Analysis
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Examine whether knowledge of ctDNA negativity influences patient decision-making
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Self- reported history of non-metastatic breast cancer
* Self- reported history of receiving chemotherapy for breast cancer
* Self- reported history of chemotherapy completed at least 6 months ago but no more than 10 years ago
* Able to complete an online survey
* English speaking

Exclusion Criteria:

N/A
